description: Shortened form of two-for-one [deal], that is, two for the price of one (BOGO).

entries.meaning: Something that yields a substantial additional benefit; something that figuratively kills two birds with one stone.
examples: Justice Clarence Thomas served up a twofer last week [â€¦]

entries.meaning: The fashion of wearing long sleeves outside a short-sleeved shirt.
A cabling device used in theatre, allowing two stage lighting instruments to be connected to one dimmer.
